subject: Steroids
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: LAUSANNE, Switzerland (AP) — The International Olympic Committee formally stripped Marion Jones of her five Olympic medals Wednesday, wiping her name from the record books after her admission that she was a drug cheat.
snippet: LAUSANNE, Switzerland (AP) — The International Olympic Committee formally stripped Marion Jones of her five Olympic medals Wednesday, wiping her name from the record books after her admission that she was a drug cheat.
